original_title: The Alan Parsons Project - Tales Of Mystery e Imagination
overview: The album was recorded and mixed at Abbey Road Studios, London, between July 1975 and January 1976.  Mastered at Abbey Road Studios, London  The Harmony Vocoder on "The Raven" was invented and built by EMI Central Research Laboratories, and is exclusively available at Abbey Road Studios
title: The Alan Parsons Project - Tales Of Mystery e Imagination
